ygData.subject: Re: Who's who at the Predacon base, and how many are there?
ygData.msgSnippet: Excuse me, was there some piece of my hail which was misinterprated, is my translator going bad? Phobia knew that his questions may cause a light response

"Excuse me, was there some piece of my hail which was misinterprated, 
is my translator going bad?" Phobia knew that his questions may cause 
a light response from the base. A damaged unknown ship is always an 
interesting target. "My name is Phobia, and unless I have the 
coordinates wrong that Scourge sent me wrong, which I seriously 
doubt, then Like yourselves I am a Predacon come to pledge his 
allegiance to the predacon commander."

"Now if you would please allow me to land before I'm forced to take 
my association, and equipment elsewhere." While you're at it give me 
your identification so when I fill out my report you can either be 
recommended for your intelligence, for allowing me a landing permit, 
or chastised for your incompetence when I leave." After dealing with 
Predacons his whole active function he knew how to press the right 
buttons. Indulge their sense of self worth and they won't bother with 
proper channels so they can hog the credit.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::DarkMouse::
> 
> She heard an alarm on the console and ran over.  She saw a new ship 
> on the monitor. 
> "Computer, increase visual, focus on section 39 by 187."
> The computer screen zoomed in on the ship.  She looked at it but 
> didn't recognize it as any ship she knew of.
> "Computer, any information on the design of the ship?"
> COMPUTER: NO KNOWN INFORMATION. SHIP IS UNCLASSIFIDED.
> "Oh great. We have an unknown ship heading towards us."
> She opened up the comm frequencies to the ship.
> "Predacon base to spacecraft. Identify yourself. You are flying in 
> Predacon space terratory.  Stay where you are. Do not fly any 
futher 
> into our terratory."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Phobias ship enters Predacon territory and stays low to the
> > ground."Computer,  monitor the auto defenses, if they take aim 
then 
> set an
> > immediate course out of this area.monitor all communications and 
> let me know
> > what you find."
> > 
> > The autoguns may have been et up to wait until a target was 
within 
> a certain
> > range, then it would continue to fire until either the target's 
> destroyed or
> > out of range. Phobia hadn't come all this way just to be slagged 
by
> > unthinking auto weapons.
> > 
> > "This is Phobia to Scourge or whomever is watching the comm. I 
> request
> > landing clearance. I'm sure arrangements can be made if you will 
> allow me to
> > land."
> > 
> > Since his ship was an alien trader ship he knew it wouldn't be 
> recognized
> > easily by the Predacons.

of

> recieved
> > > from Scourge."
> > >

from

> > > Shredder about Unicron and the Judge. He hears the message where
> > > Magmatron said hello to him. (This is not a mode, in one of the
> > > former posts Magmatron acknowledged Phobia through one of his
> > > babies.)"What are you up to Magmatron?" he thought as he 
listened 
> to
> > > the conversation. He didn't know what to think, was what he 
said 
> the
> > > truth, or was the whole story for his benefit?
